title: Six Deals You Need To Know About In Australia Today
text:
Image: Supplied

G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: Get the iPhone 11 with 100GB of data from Optus for $99 a month, over $70 off iFetch Ball Launchers for dogs, 50% off Glue fashion, $150 off Dyson Supersonic V2 hairdryers and more!

1. iPhone 11 Pro deal: Optus is selling the 64GB iPhone 11 Pro with 100GB of data for just $99 per month! The catch is that you need to sign up to a 36-month contract. Here are the inclusions:

2. Shaver Shop sale: Need a new electric razor or hairdryer? The Shaver Shop is having a big sale right now with big savings on popular items like the Dyson Supersonic V2 and Philips Series 6000. Click here to see everything!

3. Cheap 90Mbps NBN: NBN 100 plans tend to max out at around 80MBps during peak usage times. Superloop just upped the ante with a guaranteed evening speed of 90Mbps. Here are the details:

4. Bladerunner on Blu-ray for $6.98: There's still a place for physical media when it comes to movies - particularly if you have choppy internet and can't watch stuff in full HD. Ridley Scott's Bladerunner for under $7 definitely qualifies. Click here!

5. 50% off Glue fashion: Glue is having a big clearance sale on its eBay store. You can score up to 50% off clothing, shoes, bags and fashion accessories for men, women and children. Click here!

6. $49 off at Coles: Coles is still offering $49 off at its eBay store when you spend $99 or over. For those who missed the memo, you can now get most of the same food on eBay as its regular store, including fresh, frozen and chilled groceries. Click here!

Find more great bargains at Lifehacker Coupons.

As Lifehacker editors we write about stuff we like and think you'll like too. Lifehacker often has affiliate partnerships, so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
description: G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: Get the iPhone 11 with 100GB of data from Optus for $99 a month, over $70 off iFetch Ball Launchers for dogs, 50% off Glue fashion, $150 off Dyson Supersonic V2 hairdryers and more!...
